// Main Ingredient (god-pvp)
//notes: PvP: Red Dot 2/Red Dot Micro + Projection Fuse/Particle Repeater + Firmly Planted/Under Pressure + HIR/Rangefinder

This is a PvP Fusion through and through, and with the changes to fusions in S15 it’s potentially one of the best. As it’s currently only available from Xur, a god roll of this will be like Gold Dust until it sells one for us all. Keep an eye out for a Firmly Planted/Rangefinder roll (The Erentil roll) with either of the zoom increasing scopes, but Under Pressure is still an excellent perk, with HIR not changing the bolts to kill (confirm?) but offering better damage per bolt, easier cleanup and excellent synergy with Under Pressure
 tags:god-pvp
dimwishlist:item=253196586&perks=2405638014,2969185026,280464955,2846385770

// Exile's Curse (Adept) (pvp)
//notes: Worthy Variant
PvP: Fluted/Smallbore/Polygonal + Particle Repeater/Projection Fuse + Firmly Planted + Elemental Cap

Chosen Variant
PvP: Fluted/Smallbore/Polygonal + Particle Repeater/Projection Fuse + Slideshot/Quickdraw + HIR/Kickstart

Kickstart is a nice perk to reduce the charge time slightly, but has a very small period to proc it (needs charging during slide to ensure that you don’t lose the perk half way through the burst), and requires you to play a certain way to best use the perk (sprinting with a fusion out in order to get the perk to proc, leaving you vulnerable to a shotgun push or ranged primary fire) tags:pvp

// Waking Vigil (god-pvp)
//notes: PvP: Fastdraw/Steadyhand/Hitmark/Truesight + Rico/HiCal + Slideshot/Rangefinder + Opening Shot/Vorpal/KC

Of the 140 HCs, Waking has lower base range at 38 therefore it cannot really be a max range weapon, however, it does have great base handing.
Due to the inability to fight at the extended ranges of 140s, sight choice can come down to which is preferred visually. Despite this, the sights which are normally ignored because of the stat penalties they incur (Sureshot & Crossfire) can be worth it to push the range out as far as possible tags:god-pvp
dimwishlist:item=334171687&perks=1926090094,1885400500,2846385770,47981717
dimwishlist:item=334171687&perks=1926090093,1885400500,2846385770,47981717


// Waking Vigil (god-pve)
//notes: PvE: Fastdraw/Steadyhand/Hitmark/Truesight + Lightmag/Flared/Hi-Cal  + Surplus/Rapid Hit/Outlaw + Disruption Break/Vorpal/Kill Clip

60 base reload + 10 from mag perk + 10/20/40 form vorpal would be sufficient for reloads. Outlaw would max out reload (+60) but its not as consistently proc’d in higher level content.

Dungeon Perks: Surplus, Vorpal, Thresh

Hi-Cal can stunlock and knockback PvE enemies tags:god-pve

// Waking Vigil (pvp)
//notes: PvP: Fastdraw/Steadyhand/Hitmark/Truesight + Rico/HiCal + Slideshot/Rangefinder + Opening Shot/Vorpal/KC

Of the 140 HCs, Waking has lower base range at 38 therefore it cannot really be a max range weapon, however, it does have great base handing.
Due to the inability to fight at the extended ranges of 140s, sight choice can come down to which is preferred visually. Despite this, the sights which are normally ignored because of the stat penalties they incur (Sureshot & Crossfire) can be worth it to push the range out as far as possible tags:pvp
dimwishlist:item=334171687&perks=3161816588,47981717
dimwishlist:item=334171687&perks=3161816588,1015611457
dimwishlist:item=334171687&perks=3161816588,1546637391
dimwishlist:item=334171687&perks=2846385770,47981717
dimwishlist:item=334171687&perks=2846385770,1015611457
dimwishlist:item=334171687&perks=2846385770,1546637391


// Waking Vigil (pve)
//notes: PvE: Fastdraw/Steadyhand/Hitmark/Truesight + Lightmag/Flared/Hi-Cal  + Surplus/Rapid Hit/Outlaw + Disruption Break/Vorpal/Kill Clip

60 base reload + 10 from mag perk + 10/20/40 form vorpal would be sufficient for reloads. Outlaw would max out reload (+60) but its not as consistently proc’d in higher level content.

Dungeon Perks: Surplus, Vorpal, Thresh

Hi-Cal can stunlock and knockback PvE enemies tags:pve

Chosen Variant
PvP: Fluted/Smallbore/Polygonal + Particle Repeater/Projection Fuse + Slideshot/Quickdraw + HIR/Kickstart

Kickstart is a nice perk to reduce the charge time slightly, but has a very small period to proc it (needs charging during slide to ensure that you don’t lose the perk half way through the burst), and requires you to play a certain way to best use the perk (sprinting with a fusion out in order to get the perk to proc, leaving you vulnerable to a shotgun push or ranged primary fire) tags:pvp

// Exile's Curse (pvp)
//notes: Worthy Variant
PvP: Fluted/Smallbore/Polygonal + Particle Repeater/Projection Fuse + Firmly Planted + Elemental Cap

Chosen Variant
PvP: Fluted/Smallbore/Polygonal + Particle Repeater/Projection Fuse + Slideshot/Quickdraw + HIR/Kickstart

Kickstart is a nice perk to reduce the charge time slightly, but has a very small period to proc it (needs charging during slide to ensure that you don’t lose the perk half way through the burst), and requires you to play a certain way to best use the perk (sprinting with a fusion out in order to get the perk to proc, leaving you vulnerable to a shotgun push or ranged primary fire) tags:pvp
dimwishlist:item=679281855&perks=706527188,1754714824
dimwishlist:item=679281855&perks=706527188,2213355989
dimwishlist:item=679281855&perks=3161816588,1754714824
dimwishlist:item=679281855&perks=3161816588,2213355989

// Extraordinary Rendition (god-pve)
//notes: PvE: Fluted/Corkscrew/Hammer Forged + Tac/Appended Mag + Subsistence/Overflow/Outlaw/Surplus + OfA/MKC/Rampage/Frenzy/Thresh

Surplus + Frenzy combo buff handling, reload, stability (10/20/50) and damage, handing, reload respectively (20% buff, 30 stat points. This means you can get up to 80 stat points to handling and reload and 50 to stability.

Overflow and MKC have very poor synergy with each other, with MKC unable to be procced while overflow is active. While these are both excellent perks, the combo is not worth keeping tags:god-pve

// Servant Leader (god-pve)
//notes: PvE: Fluted/Corkscrew/Hammer Forged + Appended/Tac Mag/Flared + Rapid Hit/FTTC/Surplus/Outlaw + Rampage/KC/OfA/MKC/Frenzy

Randy’s Throwing Knife returns with Rapid Hit/KC, but unfortunately other damage perks such as OfA or Frenzy outshine KC in PvE
 tags:god-pve

// Fatebringer (Timelost) (god-pve)
//notes: PvE: Fluted/Corkscrew/Hammer Forged + Appended/Tac Mag + Explosive Payload/Rewind Rounds + Frenzy/Adrenaline Junkie/Firefly

Frenzy is +50 to reload, so that perk alone puts Fatebringer at max reload speed. Loader will still add a scalar so it will be faster.

Rolls are all about perk synergy so here are some notes on perk synergy re Fatebringer.
Kill Clip does not boost Explosive Payload damage, just the impact damage
Explosive and Firefly is the OG combo, but Explosive sometimes interferes with Firefly explosions
Good PvE Combos:
Explosive + Frenzy
Rewind + Frenzy/Firefly
Osmosis + AJ (?)
Suboptimal PvE combos, but good perks
Rewind + Kill Clip
Explosive + Kill Clip
 tags:god-pve
dimwishlist:item=1216319404&perks=1840239774,106909392,3038247973,4104185692
dimwishlist:item=1216319404&perks=1840239774,106909392,3038247973,3824105627


// Fatebringer (Timelost) (god-pvp)
//notes: PvP: Hammer/Corkscrew + Accurized + Killing Wind/Explosive Payload/Tunnel Vision + KC/Opening Shot

Kill Clip does not improve TTK - just forgiveness and effective range
PvP “God Roll” Hammer/(Range Barrel) + Accurized + Explosive + Opening Shot + Range MW tags:god-pvp
dimwishlist:item=1216319404&perks=3250034553,3142289711,3038247973,47981717

//notes: PvE: Fluted/Corkscrew/Hammer Forged + Appended/Tac Mag + Explosive Payload/Rewind Rounds + Frenzy/Adrenaline Junkie/Firefly

Frenzy is +50 to reload, so that perk alone puts Fatebringer at max reload speed. Loader will still add a scalar so it will be faster.

Rolls are all about perk synergy so here are some notes on perk synergy re Fatebringer.
Kill Clip does not boost Explosive Payload damage, just the impact damage
Explosive and Firefly is the OG combo, but Explosive sometimes interferes with Firefly explosions
Good PvE Combos:
Explosive + Frenzy
Rewind + Frenzy/Firefly
Osmosis + AJ (?)
Suboptimal PvE combos, but good perks
Rewind + Kill Clip
Explosive + Kill Clip

// IKELOS_SR_v1.0.2 (god-pve)
//notes: PvE: Fluted/Corkscrew/Hammer Forged + Tac Mag/Appended Mag/Flared + FTTC/Triple Tap + HIR [7 mag is higher total damage, 6 mag is higher dps]

//notes: PvE: Fluted/Corkscrew/Hammer Forged + Tac/Appended Mag + Reconstruction/Surplus + Wellspring/HIR

Reconstruction and HIR work extremely poorly together, as HIR only procs on the last ¼ of the original mag size, not the newly increased mag size.

// Trustee (god-pvp)
//notes: PvP: Fluted/Arrowhead/Corkscrew/Hammer Forged + Accurized + Killing Wind/Reconstruction/Surplus/Under Pressure + Opening Shot/HIR/EotS

Reconstruction and HIR work extremely poorly together, as HIR only procs on the last ¼ of the original mag size, not the newly increased mag size.
HIR and Under Pressure on the other hand work excellently together, as they both proc on the same part of the mag tags:god-pvp

// Fatebringer (god-pve)
//notes: PvE: Fluted/Corkscrew/Hammer Forged + Appended/Tac Mag + Explosive Payload/Rewind Rounds + Frenzy/Adrenaline Junkie/Firefly

Frenzy is +50 to reload, so that perk alone puts Fatebringer at max reload speed. Loader will still add a scalar so it will be faster.

Rolls are all about perk synergy so here are some notes on perk synergy re Fatebringer.
Kill Clip does not boost Explosive Payload damage, just the impact damage
Explosive and Firefly is the OG combo, but Explosive sometimes interferes with Firefly explosions
Good PvE Combos:
Explosive + Frenzy
Rewind + Frenzy/Firefly
Osmosis + AJ (?)
Suboptimal PvE combos, but good perks
Rewind + Kill Clip
Explosive + Kill Clip
 tags:god-pve
dimwishlist:item=2171478765&perks=1840239774,106909392,3038247973,4104185692
dimwishlist:item=2171478765&perks=1840239774,106909392,3038247973,3824105627


// Fatebringer (god-pvp)
//notes: PvP: Hammer/Corkscrew + Accurized + Killing Wind/Explosive Payload/Tunnel Vision + KC/Opening Shot

Kill Clip does not improve TTK - just forgiveness and effective range
PvP “God Roll” Hammer/(Range Barrel) + Accurized + Explosive + Opening Shot + Range MW tags:god-pvp
dimwishlist:item=2171478765&perks=3250034553,3142289711,3038247973,47981717


// Fatebringer (pve)
//notes: PvE: Fluted/Corkscrew/Hammer Forged + Appended/Tac Mag + Explosive Payload/Rewind Rounds + Frenzy/Adrenaline Junkie/Firefly

Frenzy is +50 to reload, so that perk alone puts Fatebringer at max reload speed. Loader will still add a scalar so it will be faster.

Rolls are all about perk synergy so here are some notes on perk synergy re Fatebringer.
Kill Clip does not boost Explosive Payload damage, just the impact damage
Explosive and Firefly is the OG combo, but Explosive sometimes interferes with Firefly explosions
Good PvE Combos:
Explosive + Frenzy
Rewind + Frenzy/Firefly
Osmosis + AJ (?)
Suboptimal PvE combos, but good perks
Rewind + Kill Clip
Explosive + Kill Clip
 tags:pve

// Fatebringer (pve)
//notes: PvE: Fluted/Corkscrew/Hammer Forged + Appended/Tac Mag + Explosive Payload/Rewind Rounds + Frenzy/Adrenaline Junkie/Firefly

Frenzy is +50 to reload, so that perk alone puts Fatebringer at max reload speed. Loader will still add a scalar so it will be faster.

Rolls are all about perk synergy so here are some notes on perk synergy re Fatebringer.
Kill Clip does not boost Explosive Payload damage, just the impact damage
Explosive and Firefly is the OG combo, but Explosive sometimes interferes with Firefly explosions
Good PvE Combos:
Explosive + Frenzy
Rewind + Frenzy/Firefly
Osmosis + AJ (?)
Suboptimal PvE combos, but good perks
Rewind + Kill Clip
Explosive + Kill Clip
 tags:pve

//notes: PvP: Hammer Forged/Corkscrew/Fluted/Arrowhead + Accurized + Heating Up/Moving Target/Killing Wind + Rampage/Thresh

// Frozen Orbit (god-pvp)
//notes: PvP: Hammer/Fluted/Arrowhead Brake + Accurized + Firmly Planted/Moving Target/Killing Wind/No Distractions + Snapshot/Quickdraw/Opening Shot/KC/MKC

This sniper has some interesting rolls. With KC and MKC it can get ohk body shots, and Vorpal makes it one of the ways to counter a behemoth super. However, these all roll in the same slot as the handling perks, so you are giving up better ads and feel for these build perks
 tags:god-pvp
dimwishlist:item=3473290087&perks=3250034553,3142289711,588594999,957782887

// Frozen Orbit (pvp)
//notes: PvP: Hammer/Fluted/Arrowhead Brake + Accurized + Firmly Planted/Moving Target/Killing Wind/No Distractions + Snapshot/Quickdraw/Opening Shot/KC/MKC

// Multimach CCX (god-pve)
//notes: PvE: Model 8 Red + Tac/Appended Mag + Subsistence/Threat Detector + OfA/KC

The medium zoom scopes add +3 / 4 to zoom which has a massive impact on damage drop off. Model 8 Red pushes it to 17 zoom which makes this the best in slot SMG by a long shot (get it? Because it has more range?) pushing a 60 stat SMG to 20M base range. tags:god-pve
dimwishlist:item=3717177717&perks=663495154,106909392,1820235745,4049631843


// Multimach CCX (god-pvp)
//notes: PvP: Model 8 Red + Accurized + KW/DSR/Qd + KC/Iron Reach

The medium zoom scopes add +3 / 4 to zoom which has a massive impact on damage drop off. Model 8 Red pushes it to 17 zoom which makes this the best in slot SMG by a long shot (get it? Because it has more range?) pushing a 60 stat SMG to 20M base range.

Deciding between Kill Clip and Iron Reach comes down to deciding what you want your smg to be. Iron Reach gives it an extra 3m of range (and with smgs, every metre counts) making it a better dueling weapon, while Kill Clip’s damage buff gives it a nutty ttk and an excellent snowball machine
 tags:god-pvp
dimwishlist:item=3717177717&perks=663495154,3142289711,2450788523,591790007

// Finite Impactor (god-pvp)
//notes: PvP: Hitmark/Truesight/Steadyhand/Fastdraw + Ricochet/High Cal/Armour Piercing + Firmly Planted/Killing Wind + Iron Reach/Elemental Capacitor/MKC

// Hawkmoon (god-pve)
//notes: PvE: Fluted/Corkscrew/Hammer Forged + Alloy Mag + Surplus + Polymer Grip tags:god-pve
dimwishlist:item=3856705927&perks=1840239774,1431678320,3436462433,862848869


// Hawkmoon (god-pvp)
//notes: PvP: Hammer Forged + Alloy Mag + Rangefinder/Killing Wind/Opening Shot/Eye of the Storm + Polymer Grip/ Combat Grip

Opening Shot is arguably the best in slot perk. Rangefinder is generally the go to (it does add ~3M of base range) but Hawkmoon is a run and gun weapon (in my opinion) - if you want range, run a 120 or Luna Faction boots. Opening Shot gives serious bonus to accuracy on ground and in air and helps guarantee landing the first crit (or 7 stack OHKO if you wait for perk to reset).

Moving Target is nearly worthless due to high base AA stat. tags:god-pvp
dimwishlist:item=3856705927&perks=3250034553,1431678320,2846385770,3438534621
dimwishlist:item=3856705927&perks=3250034553,1431678320,47981717,3438534621

// Outrageous Fortune (pve,pvp)
//notes: PvE: Hard/Quick + Spikes + FieldPrep / ALH / TD + Quickdraw/Rampage

Spike grenades benefit from reduced blast radius as that shifts more damage to impact damage. Velocity barrels are acceptable, but avoid Confined Launch and Volatile Launch if using spike grenades.

PvP: Confined/Volatile/(Linear/Quick) + Prox + Rangefinder / Snap / TD + QD / Rampage

Inverse of Spikes, we want increased blast radius when using Proximity Grenades - but not at the cost of other stats. tags:pve,pvp

//notes: PvE: Hitmark/Fastdraw/Steadyhand/Truesight + Tactical/Flared + Outlaw + Kill Clip/Explosive Payload/Timed Payload

Crimils is currently the max range 120 HC with RF and KC/Playload. However, the actual range benefits are pretty marginal since 40M is baseish range for 120s. You can go all in on range, but its not really necessary. tags:pve

// Crimil's Dagger (pvp)
//notes: PvP: Hitmark/Fastdraw/Steadyhand/Truesight + Accurized + Rangefinder/Moving Target + Explosive/Timed/Opening Shot/Kill Clip

Crimils is currently the max range 120 HC with RF and KC/Playload. However, the actual range benefits are pretty marginal since 40M is baseish range for 120s. You can go all in on range, but its not really necessary.

One of two 120 handcannons which can still 2 tap.
